name: Sticky Fire
description:
Made for a very short jam.

Simple Story: You're a fire (Red dot). You want to burn stuff (also red dots). But since stuff got resistant to fire it doesn't burn down and you just push it in front of you. (Makes you a cluster of red dots). But there are evil fire pits (evil big dottish ovales), which will eat you and your precious dots when you touch them.

Controls:

A/D or Left/Right - exactly that.

R - to restart

Alt+F4 - Quit Game
